trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Savannah
There was one other sighting in Savannah on or around February 20th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: The second light I saw the same night but a different location in the sky
divs: Sighting DetailsThis light was the second one I saw that night. This light was more closer and clearer than the other. There are smaller lights surrounding it with colors of blue and white.They are at a distance from the main light. This light moves and scans around from left to right then moves up and down.
